structure_recommendations.title: Add Meta Description
structure_recommendations.description: Create a concise, keyword-rich meta description (150-160 characters) to help AI understand and summarize the page's content for search results.

structure_recommendations.title: Fix Heading Structure
structure_recommendations.description: Implement a single H1 tag for the main topic and organize content hierarchically using H2 and H3 tags to clearly signal content sections to AI models.

structure_recommendations.title: Add LLM.txt File
structure_recommendations.description: Create an LLM.txt file at the root of your domain to guide AI models on how to interact with and cite your content, similar to robots.txt.

structure_recommendations.title: Implement Schema Markup
structure_recommendations.description: Add JSON-LD schema markup (e.g., Article, FAQPage, or WebPage) to explicitly define content types and key entities, enabling AI to better interpret and cite structured information.
